title: PBE
body: Hello, guys so i want to meke a question about PBE sign ups how can i make one if someone knows about that please comment bellow thanks for your support

replies.body: PBE Signups are still currently closed. I still haven't been given any word on when they'll be opening back up, but you can be sure to find out by checking the [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
so it will come out again soon??
It usually comes when a new patch comes out.
